noteR.para: To avoid all risk of damage to the systems, apply the safety and cleanliness instructions and operation recommendations before carrying out any repair engine : precautions for the repair GIEMR-001545 .
It is strictly forbidden to apply any pressure to the engine oil sump. Damage to the sump may also damage the engine by:

ul.li: raising the oil level above maximum, with a risk of engine racing.

descbody.para: Remove the engine - gearbox assembly engine and gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-001096 .
Place the engine on the component support component support equipment : use GIEMR-001522 .
Remove the con rod - piston assemblies piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Separate the con rod from the piston, if required by the check piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Remove the segments, if required by the check piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .

ul.li:
clean the part withSurface cleaner
vehicle : parts and consumables for the repair GIEMR-002445 and dry using acompressed air nozzle,
check that the part does not have any scratches, any trace of impact or abnormal wear (if necessary replace the part).

descsection.para: The gudgeon pin is locked in the con rod and free in the piston.
The gudgeon pin is fitted in the piston and con rod in such a way that it is able to rotate.

stentry.para: Piston direction of fitting; "V" at flywheel end
The piston diameter category (A - B - C)
Offset between the pin hole and the piston axis of symmetry is 0.8 mm
Piston direction of fitting; "V" at flywheel end
The piston diameter category (A - B - C)
Offset between the pin hole and the piston axis of symmetry is 0.9 mm

descsection.para: Use aexternal micrometerto measure the piston diameter at dimensionX2:
The piston diameter must be 79.470 to 79.500 mm .

descbody.para: Check that the pin slides freely in the piston before checking it.

descsection.para: Measure the gudgeon pin with aexternal micrometerorinternal micrometer:

description.title: Checking the thickness of the piston rings

descsection.para: Use aexternal micrometerto measure the thickness of the piston rings:

description.title: Checking the clearance between the piston grooves and the piston rings

descsection.para: Measure the clearance between the neck of the piston and the ring using aset of feeler gauges 9(measure at three points 120Ëš apart):
If the clearance value is outside the permitted tolerance values, replace the piston-gudgeon pin assembly or the piston rings.

description.title: Checking play at the ring section

descsection.para: Place the piston ring11to be checked in the cylinder.
Push the ring to the centre of the cylinder using the piston12.
Measure the ring end clearance using aset of feeler gauges 13:

descbody.para: If the gap is not within tolerance, replace the piston rings. If the clearance value is still outside the permitted tolerance values after the piston rings have been replaced, replace the cylinder block.

noteR.para: Do not use a sharp point or engraving tool to mark the bearing caps con rods to avoid starting a crack in the rod.
Each con rod has its own con rod cap.
They cannot be swapped or reversed.
Nevertheless, it is necessary to mark them to facilitate reinstallation.

description.title: Difference in weight of the "con rod - piston - pin" assembly

descbody.para: The maximum difference in weight between the "assembled con rod - piston - pin" assemblies is 6 g .

description.title: Centre-to-centre distance between the big end and the small end

descbody.para: The centre-to-centre distance between the big end and the small end is 128 Â± 0.035 mm .

description.title: Checking the diameter of the big end

descsection.para: Refit the big end caps piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Use ainternal micrometerto measure the big end diameter of each con rod not fitted with its bearing shell.
The diameter of the big end must be between 47.610 and 47.628 mm .

description.title: Checking the diameter of the con rod small end

descsection.para: Use ainternal micrometerto measure the small end diameter of every con rod.
The diameter of the small end must be 19.945 to 19.958 mm .
The diameter of the small end must be 20.000 to 20.014 mm .

description.title: Checking the diametric clearance of the big ends

descsection.para: Wipe any oil from the crankshaft crankpins and from the bearing shells of the con rod caps and body.
Cut pieces ofradial play measuring tape.
Insert the wire14into the axis of the crankshaft crankpins (avoiding the bearing lubrication holes).

noteR.para: Do not rotate the con rod or crankshaft during the following steps.

descsection.para: Refit the con rod - piston assembly piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Remove the con rod - piston assembly piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Measure the flattening of the wire which must be between 0.020 and 0.046 mm using the gauge printed on the packaging15of the wire.
Clean off of any remaining parts of the measuring wire on the crankshaft and bearing shells.

description.title: Checking the lateral play of the con rod

descsection.para: Refit the con rod - piston assembly piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Set the "piston - con rod" assembly of the cylinder concerned at bottom dead centre.
Fit:

ul.li: a magnetic holder on the sump joint face of the cylinder block,
a dial gauge on the magnetic holder, in contact with the machined flat surface of the big end cap.

descsection.para: Without using excessive force, manually move the con rod from one stop to the other.
Note the maximum and minimum values of con rod longitudinal displacement to determine the play between the con rod and the crankshaft.

entry.para: Lateral play of the con rod (mm)

descsection.para: Repeat the operation with each big end cap.

descbody.para: Refit the piston rings (if removed) piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Assemble the con rod and the piston (if separated) piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Refit the con rod - piston assemblies piston - con rod : removal - refitting GIEMR-001762 .
Remove the engine from the component support component support equipment : use GIEMR-001522 .
Refit the engine - gearbox assembly engine and gearbox assembly : removal - refitting GIEMR-001096 .
